turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: That's a valid concern. While inflation does erode the purchasing power of your returns, the key benefit of investing, especially over the long term, is the power of compounding. Reinvesting your earnings allows your money to grow exponentially over time. Moreover, 5-8% is an average; in some years, your returns could be significantly higher, outpacing inflation considerably.
